This is bisected to <https://github.com/neovim/neovim/commit/b98eefd8030c398735f4069ddc05b3e5b7a511a5> (#34373).

Note that the `abort_on_error=1` is required for bisecting, otherwise the ASAN log somehow isn't written before <https://github.com/neovim/neovim/commit/2dba5abcb2ee8d568b8f0181223930b598ea3c90>, and the heap-use-after-free is not observable.
